title: Paratext
description: Paratext 9 allows you to input, edit, check, and publish a translation of the Scriptures, based on the original texts (Greek, Hebrew), and modeled on versions in major languages.

title: Paratext 9 Latest Patch
description: Run this if you already have Paratext 9 installed to update to the latest version.

title: LibreOffice
description:
LibreOffice is a powerful office suite – its clean interface and feature-rich tools help you unleash your creativity and enhance your productivity. LibreOffice includes several applications that make it the most powerful Free and Open Source office suite on the market.

Comment installer LibreOffice en français.

title: RAMP
description: The Resource and Metadata Packager (RAMP) is the preferred/recommended tool for describing, packaging, submitting, and managing resources archived in SIL’s Repository for Electronic Archiving and Publishing (REAP).

title: Adapt It
description: Adapt It is a free open source tool for quickly translating between related languages. We seek to create, as a community, an adaptation tool that will run on all major platforms and facilitate translation of USFM, and collaboration between other translation tools such as UBS Paratext and Bibledit.

title: Glyssen
description: Helps you produce a high-quality dramatized audio recording of Scripture.

title: Scripture App Builder
description:
Helps you build customized Scripture apps for Android smartphones and tablets. You specify the Scripture files to use, the app name, the fonts, the colors, the audio and the icon. Scripture App Builder will package everything together and build the app for you.

Please find the dependencies on the Public (P) drive at General Interest > CS Installs > LangTran Archive > App-Builders > Dependencies

title: Reading App Builder
description:
Helps you build customized apps for smartphones and tablets.

Please find the dependencies on the Public (P) drive at General Interest > CS Installs > LangTran Archive > App-Builders > Dependencies

title: Dictionary App Builder
description:
Helps you to build customized dictionary apps for Android smartphones and tablets. You specify the lexicon data file to use, the app name, fonts, colors, the audio, illustrations and the icon.

Please find the dependencies on the Public (P) drive at General Interest > CS Installs > LangTran Archive > App-Builders > Dependencies

title: Bloom
description:
Learning to read takes books. Learning to read well, and developing a love of reading, takes lots of books. Books at all different skill levels. But how are low-literacy language communities ever to get all those books in their language? They can do it with Bloom.

Please find the Art of Reading on the Public (P) drive at General Interest > CS Installs > LangTran Archive > Bloom

title: Keyman
description:
Makes it possible for you to type in over 1,000 languages on Windows, iPhone, iPad, Android tablets and phones, and even instantly in your web browser. Keyboards for specific languages can be found on the Keyman site and on scripts.sil.org.

Note: for a completely offline install click "Install Options" before installing and disable "Check For Updates Before Install"

title: Saymore
description: Recording speakers of the world's languages is fun and rewarding, but keeping all the resulting files and meta data organized? Converting files to archive formats? Transcription? Painful. That's why we built SayMore - to make common Language Documentation tasks fun and to keep you productive.

title: Hear This
description: Bible recording made easy! HearThis provides a do-it-yourself alternative for communities wanting to get translated scripture text into their own language.

title: FLEx
description: Enables linguists to be highly productive when building a lexicon and interlinearizing texts. Powerful bulk editing tools can save hours of work. FLEx allows control of which fields and entries show up in a dictionary publication. Through Pathway, beautiful dictionaries can be exported easily. Send/Receive Project allows users to collaborate with colleagues located anywhere.

title: FLEx 9 Latest Patch
description: Run this once FLEx 9 is installed to get the latest patch for FLEx 9.

title: SIL Transcriber
description: SIL Transcriber is a web or desktop application that simplifies the transcription of speech audio files.

title: WeSay
description: WeSay helps non-linguists build a dictionary in their own language. It has various ways to help native speakers to think of words in their language and enter some basic data about them (no backslash codes, just forms to fill in)
